Après maintenant plus de six ans, le jeu est toujours aussi actif qu'à sa sortie. En 2010, une grosse mise à jour de Steam a même permis d'ouvrir encore plus le jeu en ajoutant de nombreuses fonctions, comme par exemple l'arrivée des succès, sorte de petits défis que vous devez relever. Ces derniers allongent encore plus la durée de vie déjà bien conséquente de ce titre qu'il ne faut manquer sous aucun prétexte. Counter-Strike mérite donc bien sa popularité, et cette version Source en est la preuve !

Do you want a tactical shooter that requires teamwork and coordination? Do you want a challenging shooter that rewards strategy and marksmanship? Do you want to play with a dedicated and serious community? Well too bad. Go play Global Offensive.
Můj názor na tuto hru je pozitivní . Další díl této akční a Co-Op hry je super.

Моя вторая серия CS. Да-да, я начинал с cs 1.6, но затем перешел на  Source.
Игра оставила только теплые впечатления: помню как шумной компашкой зарубали в нее на сервере, как щас помню - КТ, как участвовал в кланах, играя на турнирах. Дальше уже пыл от кланов угасал и играл соло в миксах на тех же лигах. Эх, были времена!!!

Игра заслуживает своих денег, истории, памяти! Спасибо!

Une heure de jeu, déjà recruté dans unê team ^^
Simple à prendre en main !

It gets boring sometimes, but all in all, it was a good time killer.

7.5/10

even though this game is old it is still alive and kicking i have 50+ hours in this game and i cannot reccomend it more to anyone who has the money laying around buy this game i will give you countless hours of gameplay with the different gamemodes like Jailbreak,Zombie,normal CT vs T etc.

Counter-strike:source è uno dei migliori giochi che ho.
Molto divertente e tattico,la cosa bella dei giochi come questo(della valve) sono i server dedicati con mappe modificate e skin bellissime.
Il gioco in se è bello: il classico sparatutto FPS con una buona grafica,io personalmente ci gioco solo nei server dedicati italiani,lì ci si diverte molto.

Il mio voto è 10/10
Cristian

This really is a kind of timeless game, which is really one of Valve's best.
So yes, the graphics are vastly updated compared to the new Counter-Strike: Global Offensive. But the gameplay is there. The vast amounts of gamemodes are there. And it can be addictive, from time to time. 
The deathmatch can be fun, and you can see the differences Valve have made over the years, especially if you look at the original counter-strike. There's lots of other gamemodes too, such as:

Gungame, which can be fun (depending on the map, in my opinion), Minigames (again, depending on the map), etc. These gamemodes differ from the actual game itself in their own way, and can make Counter-Strike: Source a varied, all-round game. 

All in all, I would give this game a 7.5/10, as it's not unbelievably brilliant, but it's not bad, and is a nice game to have in your inventory.

Amazing classic game. Fun with friends, or even by yourself, original gameplay brings nostalgia back to the good old days, and as always just a fun game to have and play.  the original Counterstrike was my first glimpse of online gaming, and source is a great addition to the franchise, just with updates and new maps. Great game!!!!

Я играл в 1.6 тогда для меня это было замечательно.Я радовался когда играл в неё.В те времена эта была самая реалистичная игра.Когда вышел CSS эмоций было больше... 

Новая графика и реалистичная анимация.

Затем вышла CSGO но она понравилась мне меньше. Когда я покупал оружие меня бесил этот чёртов круглешок.В CSS и CS 1.6 было удобнеее закупатся.

Игра хорошая всем рекомендую!
